patthana11.14:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.14:2.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
